column4: edgy will not run at all on my computer, I have an ASUS A8N-sli premium motherboard, eVGA GeForce 7800 GT, AMD Athlon 64 4000+
are you installing from the 64 bit cd?
but you can boot off other cd's?
You've got boot sequence right in the bios? Check that, and you may want to flash the bios as well.
